meta.name: Web3 Blockchain
meta.description: 区块链风格，深蓝金色，适合DeFi、NFT、Web3教程

base.container: background-color: #0d1117; color: #c9d1d9; font-family: 'SF Mono', 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.7; padding: 16px;

header_window.style: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #161b22, #21262d); border: 1px solid #30363d; border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0; padding: 12px 20px; margin-bottom: 20px; border-bottom: 2px solid #f7931a;

headings.h2: color: #f7931a; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; margin: 24px 0 14px; padding-left: 14px; border-left: 4px solid #f7931a;
headings.h1: color: #f7931a; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; margin: 24px 0 14px; padding-left: 14px; border-left: 4px solid #f7931a;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #161b22; color: #79c0ff; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 3px; font-size: 90%; border: 1px solid #30363d;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #161b22; color: #c9d1d9; padding: 16px; border-radius: 6px; margin: 16px 0; font-size: 12px; border: 1px solid #30363d;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #1c2b1c; border: 1px solid #238636; color: #3fb950; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 6px;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #2c1b1b; border: 1px solid #f85149; color: #ff7b72; padding: 12px 16px; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 6px;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #161b22; border: 1px dashed #30363d; color: #7ee787; padding: 20px; text-align: center; margin: 16px 0; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 12px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 32px; padding-top: 16px; border-top: 1px solid #30363d; text-align: center;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
